items.title: Broader markets outperform in a day of rebound to end nearly a percent off lows
items.description: The outperformance extended last week’s trend where both small and midcap indices recorded gains while benchmark indices remained muted.

items.title: Algos are now the dominating force in Indian equities, F&O; share in derivatives nearly 70%
items.description: Data from the National Stock Exchange (NSE) shows that algos accounted for 57 percent of all trades done in the equity cash segment in April. In F&O, it was 70 percent in FY25.

items.title: Taking Stock: Nifty off lows near 24,700, Sensex flat amid global jitters, realty and PSU banks shine
items.description: Among sectors, PSU Bank and Realty gained 2 percent each, while Consumer Durables, IT and Metal indices down 0.5 percent each, while the Nifty Bank index traded near record high levels.

items.title: Nifty Recovers Over 200 Points From Day's Low; Realty, PSU Banks Lead| Closing Bell Live
items.description: Nifty staged a sharp recovery of over 200 points from the day's low, led by strength in broader markets. The Smallcap index surged over 1%, while Nifty Bank reclaimed the 55,900 mark. Realty, PSU Banks, and FMCG stocks were among the top gainers, even as IT, Metals, and Pharma stocks lagged behind. India VIX spiked nearly 7%, but overall market breadth remained positive. Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Ashish bahety as they break down the top stock movers, sectoral trends, and trading cues for the day.

items.title: Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone shares rise 2.38% in today's session
items.description: With the stock currently priced at Rs 1466.90, Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone has demonstrated a positive trajectory, supported by strong financial metrics and favorable market sentiment.

items.title: Hindustan Unilever Shares Climb Over 1% in Today's Session
items.description: With consistent financial performance, Hindustan Unilever shows a positive movement in today's session.

items.title: Neutral Bajaj Auto; target of Rs 9151: LKP Research
items.description: LKP Research recommended Neutral rating on Bajaj Auto with a target price of Rs 9151 in its research report dated June 02, 2025.

items.title: GCPL, HUL, other key FMCG shares rise up to 3% on cut in crude edible oil import duty
items.description: India has reduced the basic customs duty on crude palm oil, crude soy oil, and crude sunflower oil from 20 percent to 10 percent, effectively from May 30.

items.title: Sensex, Nifty end flat on weak global cues; IT, metal stocks lead losses; mid, smallcaps outperform
items.description: Volatility remained elevated, with India VIX, also known as the fear gauge, rising over 6 percent to 17.15.

items.title: Top Gainers: Yes Bank, Bank of Maharashtra, Union Bank Stocks Lead NIFTY MIDCAP 150 Today
items.description: The NIFTY MIDCAP 150 index reflects the performance of these and other mid-sized companies, providing a broad view of this market segment.

items.title: Thermax Shares Rise by 2.01% in Today's Session
items.description: With shares of Thermax trading at Rs 3456.20, the company's stock performance remains an area of interest for investors in the NIFTY MIDCAP 150.

items.title: Mahindra and Mahindra Shares Gain Nearly 2% Today Amid High Volume Trading
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 3032.00, Mahindra and Mahindra has demonstrated a positive trend with today's volume surge.

items.title: Apollo Hospitals ready with Rs 8,000-crore expansion plan, to add 2,000 beds this fiscal
items.description: India's biggest healthcare player will likely have its new facilities in Bengaluru, Hyderabad, Gurugram, Kolkata and New Delhi up and running in the second half of FY26

items.title: Aditya Birla Fashion shares rise by 2.04% in today's session
items.description: Aditya Birla Fashion's shares saw a price increase of 2.04% to reach Rs 87.60 in today's trading session.

items.description: With the current price at Rs 2290.00, Godrej Properties has shown a positive movement in today's trading session.

items.title: CDSL shares surge 9% on 2x jump in daily volumes; other capital market stocks rally too
items.description: Capital market stocks gained despite a muted market sentiment. India VIX, which measures expected volatility in the markets, gained around 6% to hover around 17.12 amid rising geopolitical tensions between Ukraine and Russia, and escalating trade tensions between US and China.

items.title: Grasim Industries stock declines nearly 1% in today's trade
items.description: The stock is currently influenced by bearish sentiment, according to a Moneycontrol analysis as of 2025-05-27.

items.title: SEBI to conduct more 'Niveshak Shivir' amid success of Pune trial event
items.description: Based on the learnings of the Pune event more such Shivirs are planned. Investor education and awareness is a key focus area of SEBI.

items.title: Regencell Bioscience shares soar 23,000% in just four months: All you need to know about the Nasdaq-listed firm
items.description: The China-based Regencell Bioscience, which has only 12 employees, has a market capitalisation of $10 billion.

items.title: Glenmark’s myeloma drug delivers high response in phase-1 trial
items.description: At active dose levels (≥ 50 µg/kg), 26 of 33 evaluable patients (79%) achieved objective responses, including stringent or complete remissions in 30%, the company said.
